${ModID}:CeremonialRobe.NAME: Ceremonial Robe
${ModID}:CeremonialRobe.FLAVOR: Elegant, but difficult to fight in.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw an additional card.  At the start of each combat, lose !R2! #yDexterity.

${ModID}:AncientSpellTome.NAME: Ancient Spell Tome
${ModID}:AncientSpellTome.FLAVOR: The ink is fading and the pages are crumbling.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #bone of #bthree powerful cards.
Choose a spell to learn...

${ModID}:ChemicalZ.NAME: Chemical Z
${ModID}:ChemicalZ.FLAVOR: Drinking this was a very questionable decision.
DESCRIPTIONS: The effects of your scourge cards are increased by !R!.

${ModID}:VestOfManyPockets.NAME: Vest Of Many Pockets
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat you can draw !R! card then discard !R! card.

${ModID}:NecklaceOfShielding.NAME: Necklace Of Shielding
${ModID}:NecklaceOfShielding.FLAVOR: It's a little unstable, but it works.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat gain !R2! #yBlock and discard a card.

${ModID}:BlessedNecklace.NAME: Blessed Necklace
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [VIOLET]Necklace [VIOLET]of [VIOLET]Shielding.  #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat you can discard any number of cards to gain !R! #yBlock per card discarded.

${ModID}:TormentorsMask.NAME: Tormentor's Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply !R! #y${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:RingOfWarding.NAME: Ring of Warding
${ModID}:RingOfWarding.FLAVOR: It protects against curses, but not completely.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first !R! times each combat that you draw a #yCurse, draw a card.

${ModID}:RingOfShadows.NAME: Ring of Shadows
${ModID}:RingOfShadows.FLAVOR: The bearers of this ring all slowly went mad.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse, gain !R! #y${ModID}:Shadowcloak. On pickup, obtain #yHallucination.

${ModID}:BlackCandle.NAME: Black Candle
${ModID}:BlackCandle.FLAVOR: The candle isn't black, the flame is.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, apply !R! #y${ModID}:Jinx to ALL enemies and lose !R2! HP.

${ModID}:TuningFork.NAME: Tuning Fork
${ModID}:TuningFork.FLAVOR: It constantly makes a quiet hum.  It never ends.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you merge one #y${ModID}:Resonant card into another, #yResonance increases by an additional !R!.

${ModID}:ClownNose.NAME: Clown Nose
DESCRIPTIONS: When you cause an enemy to reach !R! unique debuffs for the first time, deal !R2! damage to it.

${ModID}:StoneScales.NAME: Stone Scales
${ModID}:StoneScales.FLAVOR: You wonder what turned these scales to stone.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat, for one turn, whenever you would take damage, take !R! less.

${ModID}:EtherealConverter.NAME: Ethereal Converter
${ModID}:EtherealConverter.FLAVOR: You have no idea how this works.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat you can turn your #yBlock into #yTemporary_HP.

${ModID}:TatteredCloak.NAME: TatteredCloak
${ModID}:TatteredCloak.FLAVOR: It's worn and has several holes in it.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Shadowcloak is a !R!% bonus rather than !R2!% .

${ModID}:EyeballStaff.NAME: Eyeball Staff
${ModID}:EyeballStaff.FLAVOR: The eye is attracted to movement.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  Once per combat you can Scry !R!.  Play any #y${ModID}:Sigils you discard.

${ModID}:ManaPurifier.NAME: Mana Purifier
${ModID}:ManaPurifier.FLAVOR: Probably the dullest looking magical artifact in existence.  It saps the color out of everything.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. All cards are non-elemental.

${ModID}:BlueMarbles.NAME: BlueMarbles
${ModID}:BlueMarbles.FLAVOR: What an odd set of marbles, all different sizes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Halve damage thresholds for [${ModID}:EldritchIcon] [${ModID}:ForceIcon] and [${ModID}:IceIcon] damage seconday effects.

${ModID}:BootsOfSpeed.NAME: Boots Of Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Activated.  You can spend [E] to draw !R! cards.

${ModID}:VialOfBlackBlood.NAME: Vial of Black Blood
${ModID}:VialOfBlackBlood.FLAVOR: It is hot enough to almost burn you.
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, replace all of your Strikes and Defends with #yDemon's #yCantrip.
You drink the contents of the vial...

${ModID}:ReverseOmamori.NAME: Reverse Omamori
${ModID}:ReverseOmamori.FLAVOR: It looks like an Omamori, but its spark of energy certainly isn't divine.
DESCRIPTIONS: For each #yCurse in your deck, start each combat with 1 #yDexterity.  Upon pickup, add !R! [#EFC851]Clumsy to your deck.

${ModID}:VialOfNectar.NAME: Vial of Nectar
${ModID}:VialOfNectar.FLAVOR: It's very thick, but tastes sweet.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain !R! #yTemporary_HP.

${ModID}:RockyEgg.NAME: RockyEgg
${ModID}:RockyEgg.FLAVOR: You're not sure what creature laid this, but it occasionally stirs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a #ySigil card into your deck, #yUpgrade it.

${ModID}:Mythril.NAME: Mythril
${ModID}:Mythril.FLAVOR: It's extremely hard for something so light.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with no cards in hand, gain !R! #yBlock.

${ModID}:RegularBandages.NAME: Regular Bandages
${ModID}:RegularBandages.FLAVOR: They're the generic store bought version.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, gain !R! #yBlock.

${ModID}:UnmeltingIce.NAME: Unmelting Ice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #y${ModID}:Frostbite, apply !R! more.

${ModID}:TwistedShuriken.NAME: Twisted Shuriken
${ModID}:TwistedShuriken.FLAVOR: You aren't sure how to throw this, but it looks brutal.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play !R2! attacks in a single turn, ALL enemies lose !R! #yStrength.

${ModID}:Pliers.NAME: Pliers
${ModID}:Pliers.FLAVOR: The jaws have flecks of dried blood on them.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #y${ModID}:Crushed, your next attack deals !R! additional damage.

${ModID}:PaperKat.NAME: Paper Kat
${ModID}:PaperKat.FLAVOR: You think you occasionally hear it purr, but only when you aren't paying attention.
DESCRIPTIONS: HP loss from #y${ModID}:Jinx is twice as effective.

${ModID}:PointyDentures.NAME: Pointy Dentures
${ModID}:PointyDentures.FLAVOR: This is an odd object to enchant with power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yTemporary_HP from [${ModID}:EldritchIcon] attacks, gain !R! more.

${ModID}:EnchantmentOils.NAME: Enchantment Oils
${ModID}:EnchantmentOils.FLAVOR: Makes your sword magic, just rub it on.
DESCRIPTIONS: All of your #yStaff #yStrike cards gain a random element and deal !R! additional damage.

${ModID}:HexedStaff.NAME: Hexed Staff
${ModID}:HexedStaff.FLAVOR: Whenever you hold it, you immediately feel angrier.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #y${ModID}:Jinx, for each #yCurse in your deck, apply 1 extra stack.  Upon pickup, obtain [#EFC851]Wrath.

${ModID}:SoulLamp.NAME: Soul Lamp
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you are attacked each turn, deal !R! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] back.

${ModID}:TransparentBracelet.NAME: Transparent Bracelet
${ModID}:TransparentBracelet.FLAVOR: Takes forever to find it if you take it off.
DESCRIPTIONS: #y${ModID}:Shadowcloak can be used to boost the first #yBlock card each turn instead of the first attack.

${ModID}:MarkOfTheVoid.NAME: Mark of the Void
${ModID}:MarkOfTheVoid.FLAVOR: A strange symbol marks your forehead.  It nibbles at your mana on a regular basis.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every !R! turns, lose [E] .

${ModID}:RandomRelic.NAME: Random Relic
${ModID}:RandomRelic.FLAVOR: It could be anything.  It could even be a boat.
DESCRIPTIONS: Granted one of four possible Arcanist starting relics, chosen at random.
